name: Bath & North East Somerset Core Strategy

housing-numbers.notes: Total housing requirement of around 13,000 homes (12,960 specifically) for 2011-2029. Housing distributed across Bath (7,020), Keynsham (2,150), Somer Valley (2,470), Rural Areas (1,120), and Whitchurch Green Belt (200). Annual average of 700+ homes required with 720 calculated from total.
